summary: MY 2016 HONDA PILOT WITH 61,000 MILES ON HAS RECENTLY GIVEN ME THE KELYESS START SYSTEM WARNING.  IT SEEMS THAT THIS IS A PROBLEM WITH PILOTS FROM THIS MODEL YEAR.  IT ALSO SEEMS THAT DEALERS DO NOT KNOW HOW TO FIX IT.  IT APPEARS MANY PEOPLE HAVE TRIED NUMEROUS THINGS, WITHOUT ANY LUCK.  I DO NOT WISH TO PAY FOR THE DEALER TO FIX SOMETHING THAT MAY NOT BE FIXABLE.  WHAT CAN BE DONE ABOUT THIS?
